author: Jocelyn Noveck, Larry Neumeister and Marina Villeneuve / AP
title: ‘Please Come Help Us’: New York Gov. Cuomo Begs for Medical Volunteers
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo urgently appealed for medical volunteers Monday amid a “staggering” number of coronavirus deaths in the state.
content: (NEW YORK) — New York’s governor urgently appealed for medical volunteers Monday amid a “staggering” number of coronavirus deaths, as he and health officials warned that the crisis unfolding in New York City is just a preview of what other U.S. communities co… [+6151 chars]
